idea-plugin.name: Cobalt2
idea-plugin.description:
Remake of Wesbos' Cobalt2 Theme for Jetbrains IDE. This is a complete UI Theme for your Jetbrains IDE.
After installing you can select the new theme with Preferences --> Appearance & Behavior --> Appearance --> Theme --> Select "Cobalt 2"
If you don't want to use the complete UI Theme but just the editor scheme you can select it with Preferences --> Editor --> General --> Color Scheme --> Cobalt 2
